title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Dog Breeding Establishments
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Dog Breeding Establishments 
(Transfer of Departmental Administration and Ministerial Functions) Order
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited dog breeding establishment (transfer departmental administration ministerial functions) order

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: (2) This Order comes into operation on 1 August 2025.
text_raw:
2025. 

(2) This Order comes into operation on 1 August 2025.

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 2. (1) The administration and business in connection with the exercise,
text_raw:
2. (1) The administration and business in connection with the exercise, 
performance or execution of any functions transferred by Article 3 are 
transferred to the Department of Agriculture, Food and the Marine. 

(2) References to the Department of Housing, Local Government and 
Heritage contained in any Act or any instrument made under an Act and relating 
to any administration and business transferred by paragraph (1) shall, from the 
commencement of this Order, be construed as references to the Department of 
Agriculture, Food and the Marine.
text_norm: 2 (1) administration business connection exercise performance execution function transferred article 3 transferred department agriculture food marine (2) reference department housing local government heritage contained act instrument made act relating administration business transferred paragraph (1) shall commencement order construed reference department agriculture food marine

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 3. (1) The functions vested in the Minister for Housing, Local Government
text_raw:
3. (1) The functions vested in the Minister for Housing, Local Government 
and Heritage by or under the provisions of Part 1 and Part 2 of the Dog Breeding 
Establishments Act 2010 (No. 29 of 2010) are transferred to the Minister for 
Agriculture, Food and the Marine. 

(2) References to the Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage 
contained in any Act or instrument made under such Act and relating to any 
functions transferred by this Article shall, from the commencement of this Order, 
be construed as references to the Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine.
text_norm: 3 (1) function vested minister housing local government heritage provision part 1 part 2 dog breeding establishment act 2010 (no 29 2010) transferred minister agriculture food marine (2) reference minister housing local government heritage contained act instrument made act relating function transferred article shall commencement order construed reference minister agriculture food marine

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 4. Where, immediately before the commencement of this Order, any legal
text_raw:
4. Where, immediately before the commencement of this Order, any legal 
proceedings are pending to which the Minister for Housing, Local Government 
and Heritage is a party and the proceedings have reference to functions 
transferred by this Order to the Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine, 
the name of the Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine shall, in so far as 
the proceedings relate to any function transferred by this Order, be substituted in 
the proceedings for that of the Minister for Housing, Local Government and 
Heritage or added in the proceedings, as may be appropriate, and the proceedings 
shall not abate by reason of such substitution. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 25th July, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [391] 3
text_norm: 4 immediately commencement order legal proceeding pending minister housing local government heritage party proceeding reference function transferred order minister agriculture food marine name minister agriculture food marine shall far proceeding relate function transferred order substituted proceeding minister housing local government heritage added proceeding may appropriate proceeding shall abate reason substitution notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 25th july 2025 391 3

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 5. Anything commenced before the commencement of this Order by or
text_raw:
5. Anything commenced before the commencement of this Order by or 
under the authority of the Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage 
may, in so far as it relates to functions transferred by this Order to the Minister 
for Agriculture, Food and the Marine, be carried on or completed on or after such 
commencement by the Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine.
text_norm: 5 anything commenced commencement order authority minister housing local government heritage may far relates function transferred order minister agriculture food marine carried completed commencement minister agriculture food marine

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 6. Every document (including any certificate or licence) granted or made in
text_raw:
6. Every document (including any certificate or licence) granted or made in 
the performance of a function transferred by this Order shall, if and in so far as 
it was operative immediately before the commencement of this Order, have 
effect from such commencement as if it had been granted or made by the 
Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine.
text_norm: 6 every document (including certificate licence) granted made performance function transferred order shall far operative immediately commencement order effect commencement granted made minister agriculture food marine

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 7. References to the Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage
text_raw:
7. References to the Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage 
contained in the constitution of any company and relating to any function 
transferred by this Order shall, from the commencement of this Order, be 
construed as references to the Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine.
text_norm: 7 reference minister housing local government heritage contained constitution company relating function transferred order shall commencement order construed reference minister agriculture food marine

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 8. (1) All property, rights and liabilities held, enjoyed or incurred before the
text_raw:
8. (1) All property, rights and liabilities held, enjoyed or incurred before the 
commencement of this Order by the Minister for Housing, Local Government 
and Heritage, in connection with the functions transferred by this Order are 
transferred to the Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine and, 
accordingly, without any further conveyance, transfer or assignment, on such 
commencement – 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

that property, both real and personal, vests in the Minister for 
Agriculture, Food and the Marine, 

those rights shall be enjoyed by the Minister for Agriculture, Food 
and the Marine and 

those liabilities are liabilities of the Minister for Agriculture, 
Food and the Marine. 

(2) All moneys, stocks, shares and securities transferred to the Minister for 
Agriculture, Food and the Marine by this Article which, on the commencement 
of this Order, are standing in the name of the Minister for Housing, Local 
Government and Heritage shall, on the request of the Minister for Agriculture, 
Food and the Marine, be transferred into the name of the Minister for 
Agriculture, Food and the Marine. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [391] 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

22 July, 2025. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach.
